    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>857</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mid-Term Break (by Seamus Heaney)  - Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Mid-Term Break (por Seamus Heaney)  - Cuestionario</string>
            <string language="ga">Mid-Term Break (by Seamus Heaney) – Tráth na gCeist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mid-Term Bruch (durch Seamus Heaney) - Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rupture à moyen terme (par Seamus Heaney) - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ruptura mid-Term (por Seamus Heaney) - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rottura mid-Term (da Seamus Heaney) - quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενδιάμεσο σπάσιμο (από το Seamus Heaney) - 
διαγωνισμός γνώσεων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">To understand the emotions in the poem, to revise the main images in the poem.</string>
            <string language="es">Para comprender las emociones del poema, revise las principales imágenes del poema.</string>
            <string language="ga">Chun mothúcháin an dáin a thuiscint, chun dul siar ar phríomhíomhánna an dáin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Gefühle im Gedicht verstehen, um die 
Hauptbilder im Gedicht zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour comprendre les émotions dans la poésie, 
pour mettre à jour les images principales dans la poésie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para compreender as emoções no poema, para 
revisar as imagens principais no poema.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per capire le emozioni nel poem, per modificare 
le immagini principali nel poem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για να καταλάβει τις συγκινήσεις στο ποίημα, για να 
αναθεωρήσουν τις βασικές εικόνες στο ποίημα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
